languages.text: "Что ж, элантах... {name}, верно? Я устала от титулов и прозваний — и своего, и чужих. Коль путь твой лежит за пределы Лилэтан, я отправляюсь с тобой — на поиски прочих братьев, рассеянных среди звезд. Быть может, они примут меня с большей теплотой, чем этот круг".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, эл'антар... {name}, верно? Я устала от титулов и прозваний — и своего, и чужих. Коль путь твой лежит за пределы Лилэтан, я отправляюсь с тобой — на поиски прочих братьев, рассеянных среди звезд. Быть может, они примут меня с большей теплотой, чем этот круг".

languages.text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, элантах... {name}, верно? Я устала от титулов и прозваний — и своего, и чужих. Коль путь твой лежит за пределы Лилэтан, я отправляюсь с тобой — на поиски прочих братьев, рассеянных среди звезд. Быть может, они примут меня с большей теплотой, чем этот круг".

traits.locale_text: "Well, el'antar... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go without you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

"Well, el'antar... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go without you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

"Well, el'antar... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go without you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

"Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

languages.text: “老实说，外界人……{name}，是吧？我已经厌倦了那些头衔与安排，无论是我自己的，还是别人的。既然你的道路远在莉莱赞的界限之外，我愿意与你一同前进，寻找散落在群星之中的其他同族。或许，他们会比这里的族人更热情地迎接我。”
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，外界人……{name}，是吧？我已经厌倦了那些头衔与安排，无论是我自己的，还是别人的。既然你的道路远在莉莱赞的界限之外，我愿意与你一同前进，寻找散落在群星之中的其他同族。或许，他们会比这里的族人更热情地迎接我。”

languages.text: 「そうだな、エランタ…{name}、と呼んでもよいか？肩書きや称号にはうんざりしているんだ――自分のも他人のも。あなたの道がリラエタンの境界を越えるなら、私は共に行きたい。星々に散らばる他の仲間を探すために。そんな仲間ならきっと、ここの巣族より、温かく私を迎え入れてくれると思うから」
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな、エランタ…{name}、と呼んでもよいか？肩書きや称号にはうんざりしているんだ――自分のも他人のも。あなたの道がリラエタンの境界を越えるなら、私は共に行きたい。星々に散らばる他の仲間を探すために。そんな仲間ならきっと、ここの巣族より、温かく私を迎え入れてくれると思うから」

languages.text: "Nun, Elantach ... {name}, richtig? Ich bin der Titel und Bezeichnungen müde – meiner eigenen und der von anderen. Da Euer Pfad außerhalb der Grenzen von Lileath liegt, werde ich mit Euch kommen – um nach anderen meiner Art zu suchen, die in den Sternen verstreut sind. Vielleicht begrüßen sie mich herzlicher als diese Rotte."
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Elantach ... {name}, richtig? Ich bin der Titel und Bezeichnungen müde – meiner eigenen und der von anderen. Da Euer Pfad außerhalb der Grenzen von Lileath liegt, werde ich mit Euch kommen – um nach anderen meiner Art zu suchen, die in den Sternen verstreut sind. Vielleicht begrüßen sie mich herzlicher als diese Rotte."

languages.text: « Eh bien, elantach... ou {name}, si je ne me trompe pas ? J'en ai assez des titres et des désignations, les miens comme ceux des autres. Puisque votre voie vous conduit en dehors de la lilaethan, je vous accompagnerai, afin de chercher mes autres semblables dispersés parmi les étoiles. Ils m'accueilleront peut-être plus chaleureusement que ceux d'ici. »
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, elantach... ou {name}, si je ne me trompe pas ? J'en ai assez des titres et des désignations, les miens comme ceux des autres. Puisque votre voie vous conduit en dehors de la lilaethan, je vous accompagnerai, afin de chercher mes autres semblables dispersés parmi les étoiles. Ils m'accueilleront peut-être plus chaleureusement que ceux d'ici. »

languages.text: «Bueno, elantach... {name}, ¿cierto? Me he cansado de los títulos y las designaciones, tanto propias como ajenas. Ya que tu senda conduce más allá de los límites del Lilaethan, te acompañaré para buscar a más de mis hermanos desperdigados entre las estrellas. Tal vez me reciban con más aprecio que esta progenie».
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, elantach... {name}, ¿cierto? Me he cansado de los títulos y las designaciones, tanto propias como ajenas. Ya que tu senda conduce más allá de los límites del Lilaethan, te acompañaré para buscar a más de mis hermanos desperdigados entre las estrellas. Tal vez me reciban con más aprecio que esta progenie».

languages.text: "O hâlde elantach... Daha doğrusu {name} demeliyim, değil mi? Hem kendime hem de başkalarına ünvan ve titrlerle hitap etmekten sıkıldım. Madem yolun Lilaethan'dan öteye gidiyor, ben de seninle gelip türümün yıldızlar arasında savrulmuş başka mensuplarını arayacağım. Belki onlar beni, buradaki soydaşlarımdan daha iyi kabullenir."
languages.original_text: "Well, elantach... {name}, yes? I am tired of titles and designations — my own and others'. Since your path lies beyond the limits of the Lilaethan, I will go with you — to search for others of my kind scattered among the stars. Perhaps they will greet me more warmly than this brood."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde elantach... Daha doğrusu {name} demeliyim, değil mi? Hem kendime hem de başkalarına ünvan ve titrlerle hitap etmekten sıkıldım. Madem yolun Lilaethan'dan öteye gidiyor, ben de seninle gelip türümün yıldızlar arasında savrulmuş başka mensuplarını arayacağım. Belki onlar beni, buradaki soydaşlarımdan daha iyi kabullenir."
